definition[0]: the nose and mouth of an animal, especially a dog or horse
definition[1]: a cover that you put over a dog’s mouth to stop it from biting people
definition[2]: the open end of a gun, where the bullets come out
definition[3]: to prevent someone from saying what they think in public
example[0]: an attempt by the government to muzzle the country’s media
definition[4]: to put a muzzle over a dog’s mouth so that it cannot bite people
